Package org.apache.bookkeeper.client

Class BookKeeper.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.apache.bookkeeper.client.BookKeeper.Builder
Enclosing class:
BookKeeper
public static class BookKeeper.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
BookKeeper Client Builder to build client instances.
See Also:
BookKeeperBuilder

      @Deprecated public BookKeeper.Builder setEventLoopGroup​(io.netty.channel.EventLoopGroup f)

      Configure the bookkeeper client with a provided EventLoopGroup.
      Parameters:

      client builder.
